lrsUiDev.description: Determines if the application is running in dev mode.

electronicCaseBinder.description: Url for accessing ecase binder.  {caseNumber} in the string is a placeholder for inserting an actual case number

electronicAppraisal.description: Url for eAppraisals.  {caseNumber} in the string is a placeholder for inserting an actual case number

totalScorecardEmulator.description: Url for accessing TOTAL scorecard emulator.  {caseNumber} in the string is a placeholder for inserting an actual case number

totalScorecardEmulatorComparison.description: Url for accessing TOTAL scorecard emulator comparison.  {caseNumber} in the string is a placeholder for inserting an actual case number
